To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: The recording is of the Saturday Night Camel Caravan, hosted by Ted Pierson (personality). The show featurings Benny Goodman (musician), Louis Armstrong (musician), the Benny Goodman Band (musical group), and the lynn Murray Choir (musical group). The recordings are from July 27, 1937 to October 28, 1939.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
